properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 3:01AM EST until February 1 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Northeast South Carolina coastal waters.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY
